m_szDocTitle: 10 Key Clean Energy Statements From Obama's Climate Speech | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: “I want America to build that future right here in the United States of America.” Then why this from ABC News? With the approval of the Obama administration, an electric car company that received a $529 million federal government loan guarantee is assembling its first line of cars in Finland, saying it could not find a facility in the United States capable of doing the work. Bob_Wallace So what do you have against the free market? OutWest01503 I have nothing against the “free” market – but the “free” market isn’t free when US Taxpayers make a $529 million loan guarantee to the company.  The US
